org.sat4j.specs

インタフェース RandomAccessModel

  • 既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    ICDCL<D>, IGroupPBSolver, IGroupSolver, IIntegerPBSolver, IMultiObjOptimizationProblem, IOptimizationProblem, IPBCDCLSolver<D>, IPBSolver, IProblem, ISolver
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AbstractClauseSelectorSolver, AbstractLinMultiObjOptimizer, AbstractMinimalModel, AbstractOutputSolver, AbstractSelectorVariablesDecorator, ClausalCardinalitiesDecorator, ClausalConstraintsDecorator, ConstraintRelaxingPseudoOptDecorator, DimacsOutputSolver, DimacsStringSolver, EmptySolver, FullClauseSelectorSolver, GateTranslator, GroupClauseSelectorSolver, GroupPBSelectorSolver, HighLevelXplain, InprocCardConstrLearningSolver, IntegerPBSolverDecorator, LexicoDecorator, LexicoDecoratorPB, LeximinDecorator, LPStringSolver, ManyCore, ManyCoreIntegerPB, ManyCorePB, MaxSatDecorator, Minimal4CardinalityModel, Minimal4InclusionModel, MinOneDecorator, MinSumOWAOptimizer, ModelIterator, ModelIteratorToSATAdapter, NegationDecorator, ObjectiveReducerPBSolverDecorator, OPBStringSolver, OptimalModelIterator, OptToPBSATAdapter, OptToSatAdapter, OrderedObjsOWAOptimizer, PBAdapter, PBSolver, PBSolverCautious, PBSolverClause, PBSolverCP, PBSolverCPLong, PBSolverCPLongReduceToCard, PBSolverDecorator, PBSolverHandle, PBSolverResCP, PBSolverResolution, PBSolverWithImpliedClause, PreprocCardConstrLearningSolver, PseudoIteratorDecorator, PseudoOptDecorator, SingleSolutionDetector, SolutionCounter, Solver, SolverDecorator, StatisticsSolver, SteppedTimeoutLexicoDecoratorPB, SubModelIterator, SumLeximinDecompositionOWAOptimizer, UserFriendlyPBStringSolver, Xplain, XplainPB

    public interface RandomAccessModel
    That interface allows to efficiently retrieve the truth value of a given variable in the solver.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      boolean model(int var)
      Provide the truth value of a specific variable in the model.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • model

        boolean model(int var)
        Provide the truth value of a specific variable in the model. That method should be called AFTER isSatisfiable() if the formula is satisfiable. Else an exception UnsupportedOperationException is launched.
        パラメータ:
        var - the variable id in Dimacs format
        戻り値:
        the truth value of that variable in the model
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.6
        関連項目:
        #model()
